pkgmetadata.longdescription: Toolkit for Electroencephalography Data // Analysis and visualization tools for electroencephalography (EEG) data. Includes functions for (i) plotting EEG caps, time courses, and spatial maps; (ii) spatial and/or temporal smoothing of EEG data; (iii) frequency domain analysis (FFT) of EEG data (iv) spatial or temporal Independent Component Analysis of EEG data, and (v) simulating event-related potential EEG data.
